titles.title: Commending the Festival of Children Foundation for its outstanding efforts on behalf of children and expressing the support of the House of Representatives for the designation of a "Child Awareness Month".
Commending the Festival of Children Foundation for its outstanding efforts on behalf of children.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Mr. Osborne moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 759.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/29/2004--Passed House amended. Commends the Festival of Children Foundation of Southern California for its efforts on behalf of children and for the difference it has made in its community and in the lives of children.
